question:
[Clyde] is having a meal with his father [Johnny]. [Helen] and [Johnny] are happy with each other. [Kecia] and her sister [Helen] were arguing over a toy. While they were fighting, [Kecia]'s sister [Sharon] grabbed the toy, and ran off to play with it by herself. [Dorothy] asked her daughter, [Sharon], if she would like to go to a movie with her on Saturday night. [Clyde]'s aunt [Florence] took him to the store to do some last minute party shopping.
Question: How is [Florence] related to [Dorothy]?
